Title: Kubot: The Aswang Chronicles 2
Writer: Michiko Yamamoto (screenplay), Erik Matti (story), Michiko Yamamoto (story)
Actors: Dingdong Dantes, Abra, Ku Aquino, Ramon Bautista
Plot: A family of bloodthirsty monsters descends on the city to take revenge on the man that caused the death of so many of their own.
